entry.tran: 国内的;内政的;(组织)内部的
entry.def: Internal is used to describe things that exist or happen inside a country or organization.

example.ex: The country stepped up internal security...
We now have a Europe without internal borders...
example.tran: 我们如今拥有一个内部没有边界的欧洲。

entry.tran: 体内的;(物体或场所)内部的
entry.def: Internal is used to describe things that exist or happen inside a particular person, object, or place.

example.ex: Some of the internal walls of my house are made of plasterboard.
example.tran: 我家房子的一些内墙是石膏板做的。
